long_description:
Inputs
------
default: DataContainer
    Any DataContainer - likely connected to the output of the OPEN_SERIAL node.
short_description: The PROLOGIX_HELP command returns a list of available Prologix USB-to-GPIB firmware commands.

parameters.name: connection
parameters.description: The open serial connection with the instrument.

returns.description: A list of available Prologix USB-to-GPIB firmware commands
